thread.title: Revenue Operations Assistant - Digital - Sports Management
thread.title_full: Revenue Operations Assistant - Digital - Sports Management

title: Revenue Operations Assistant - Digital - Sports Management
text: Posted/Updated: 10-07-2015 Brief Job Description: Ensure timely RFP response and generation of creative and compelling cross-platform campaign proposals to drive maximum revenue and strong ROI for our clients   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
